original_text: But the son of the slave was born according to the flesh, while the son of the free woman was born through promise.
korean_text: 여종에게서는 육체를 따라 났고 자유 있는 여자에게서는 약속으로 말미암았느니라

sentences.original_text: But the son of the slave was born according to the flesh
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 종의 아들은 육체를 따라 났고

sentences.original_text: while the son of the free woman was born through promise.
sentences.korean_translation: 자유 있는 여자의 아들은 약속으로 났습니다
